answerText: "Sexy"[10] "Sexy" is one of the stories in Interpreter of Maladies, a collection by this Indian-American author of Unaccustomed Earth and The Namesake.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 4 | 13 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this story learns all she knows about her lover's culture from her co-worker, Laxmi. For 10 points each: [10] Name this story about the relationship between the white woman Miranda and her Indian boyfriend Dev. It's title is a word Dev whispered to Miranda in the Mapparium.
